verses.translation: I swear by this city, [Makkah]
And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city
And [by] the father and that which was born [of him]
We have certainly created man into hardship

verses.arabic: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Does he think that no one will have power over him?
He says, 'I have spent wealth in abundance'
Does he think that no one has seen him?
Have We not made for him two eyes
And a tongue and two lips
And guided him to the two ways?
But he has not broken through the difficult pass
And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?
It is the freeing of a slave

verses.arabic: أَوْ إِطْعَامٌ فِي يَوْمٍ ذِي مَسْغَبَةٍ
verses.transliteration: Aw it'amun fi yawmin dhi masghabah
verses.translation: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger
An orphan of near relationship
Or a needy person in misery

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْمَرْحَمَةِ
verses.transliteration: Thumma kana min alladhina amanu wa tawasaw bi-as-sabri wa tawasaw bi-al-marhamah
verses.translation: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion
Those are the companions of the right

verses.arabic: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِآيَاتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ
verses.transliteration: Wa alladhina kafaru bi-ayatina hum ashabu al-mash'amah
verses.translation: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left
Over them will be fire closed in
